thread.title: Solaris Technologies to Partner With Briggs Equipment in Tower Rentals
thread.title_full: Solaris Technologies to Partner With Briggs Equipment in Tower Rentals

title: Solaris Technologies to Partner With Briggs Equipment in Tower Rentals
text:
Solaris Technologies to Partner With Briggs Equipment in Tower Rentals August 03, 2015, 07:11 AM Related: Towers 
Solaris Technologies announced that it has partnered with Briggs Equipment, Inc. as its exclusive rental partner for the Solaris Tough Tower™ product line.Briggs Equipment, Inc. will execute tower rentals for the continental United States.Solaris Technologies, whose primary focus has been the sale of Cellular-on-Wheels (COW) mobile towers, is now partnered with Briggs Equipment, to offer its customer base a rental alternative.“Our partnership with Solaris reflects our commitment to be a one stop shop for our customer’s needs. With over 50 years of experience in the rental industry, we have the resources, infrastructure and a deep understanding of customer’s expectations from their rental experience – we’re excited to couple that knowledge and expertise with Solaris Technologies’ innovative ToughTower™ product,” said Chris Meinecke, President and COO, Briggs Equipment.Solaris Technologies is an award-winning global telecommunications equipment company that provides innovative ToughTower™ product platforms, fiber optics, transceivers, multi-vendor new and refurbished equipment, and certified high-quality repair services. Today's Other News
